channel.title: Someone who are able to send out my client to everyone
channel.description: Hi, I am in need one someone who can portforword my client and upload it so everyone can play. By doing this, I will make you Admin on my server. Reply back saying you are able to do it THX :| :)

item.title: Someone who are able to send out my client to everyone
item.dc:creator: @tom_yoyo tom yoyo
item.description:
@tom_yoyo wrote:

i have already done that, thats why i need some one to do it for me.
My Problem -

  • Whenever i set up the no-ip and put the ip on my client ( gui.java) it would say error connecting to server
  • I have already set up portforwording on my router ( my router is the Bell 2 Wire Boxes) but it still seems to not work

Read full topic
item.source: Someone who are able to send out my client to everyone

item.title: Someone who are able to send out my client to everyone
item.dc:creator: @laurent_248 laurent 248
item.description:
@laurent_248 wrote:

ok No problem, if you port forwarded, you just change the client IP, it’s not really difficult. search 127.0.0.1 in gui.java or client.java and replace it by your no-ip.

Read full topic
